TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataContractSurrogate

summary.span: 提供 在序列化 (Serialization)、還原序列化 (Deserialization)，以及匯出和匯入 XML 結構描述文件 (XSD) 期間，必須用來將型別取代成另一種型別的方法。

span.span: Provides the methods needed to substitute one type for another by the during serialization, deserialization, and export and import of XML schema documents (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您需要執行將型別或物件取代成其他的型別或物件，或是動態產生結構描述的變形而要使用 時，便可使用 。Use the when using the if you need to do one of the following: substitute one type or object for another, or to dynamically generate schema variations. 範例應用程式，請參閱[DataContract 代理](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontract-surrogate.md)。For a sample application, see [DataContract Surrogate](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontract-surrogate.md). 如需有關資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 在執行階段，您可以透過使用 來尋找 執行個體，以便在服務中尋找任何作業的特定 。At run time, you can find the specific for any operation in a service by using the to find the instance. 如需有關如何實作介面以建立 surrogate 的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約代理](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md)。For more information about implementing the interface to create a surrogate, see [Data Contract Surrogates](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md). 當您使用 和 類別時，您也可以使用 來影響 XML 結構描述的匯入和匯出。You can also use the to affect the import and export of XML schemas when you are using the and classes. 您可以藉由將 指派給 類別的 屬性，或指派給 類別的 屬性以達到這個目的。You can do so by assigning the to the property of the class, or to the property of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 結構描述匯入和匯出](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md)。For more information, see [Schema Import and Export](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範 介面的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the interface. 這段程式碼會取代 `Person` 類別之 `PersonSurrogated` 型別的序列化。The code substitutes the serialization of the `Person` type for a `PersonSurrogated` class. [!code-csharp[IDataContractSurrogate#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/idatacontractsurrogate/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[IDataContractSurrogate#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/idatacontractsurrogate/vb/source.vb#0)]

span.span: DataContract Surrogate Sample
Data Contract Surrogates
Using Data Contracts

summary.span: 在結構描述匯出作業期間，將附註插入至非 null 傳回值的結構描述。

span.span: During schema export operations, inserts annotations into the schema for non-null return values.

summary.span: 在還原序列化期間，傳回指定物件的替代物件。

span.span: During deserialization, returns an object that is a substitute for the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在簡單實作中，使用 if…then…else 控制結構來測試 `obj` 值是否為被替代的型別。In a simple implementation, use an if…then…else control structure to test whether the `obj` value is of the surrogated type. 如果是的話，請依需要加以轉換並傳回已取代的物件。If so, transform it as necessary and return the substituted object. 已取代的物件可能是新執行個體，或是相同的 `obj` 執行個體。The substituted object can be a new instance or the same `obj` instance. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the method. summary.span: 設定已知型別的集合，以便用於自訂資料物件的序列化和還原序列化作業。

span.span: Sets the collection of known types to use for serialization and deserialization of the custom data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在使用 方法將附註插入至結構描述時，才需要在結構描述匯出或匯入期間使用這個方法。This method is required during schema export or schema import only if annotations are inserted into the schema using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法必須傳回`null`因為在還原序列化資料會轉換為類型和就會擲回。This method must not return `null` because on deserialization the data will be cast to type and an is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the method. param.name: typeName

param.span: 在結構描述中的型別命名空間。

param.name: customData
param.span: 表示已插入至 XML 結構描述定義中之附註的物件，這個定義是可以用來尋找所參考類型的資料。

span.span: The object that represents the annotation inserted into the XML schema definition, which is data that can be used for finding the referenced type.

span.span: During schema import, returns the type referenced by the schema.
The to use for the referenced type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在用來表示結構描述類型的 CLR 類型，就應該傳回 `Null`。`Null` should be returned if a CLR type does not exist for representing the schema type. 這將導致在結構描述匯入期間產生新型別。This will cause a new type to be generated during schema import. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the method. span.span: Processes the type that has been generated from the imported schema.
A that contains the processed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以透過這個方法，修改已輸入 或 中的其他資訊。The input or other information in the can be modified by the user in this method. 如果傳回 `null`，將會導致無法產生類型。If `null` is returned, it will cause the type to not be generated. 如果傳回新的 ，新的宣告將會取代已產生的原始類型。If a new is returned, it will replace the original type generated.
